name: The Apple Tree (itch)
description:
This is a story I wrote for Inkle's Campfire Tales contest, for their upcoming Pendragon game. Two characters settle down for the night, and a tale is spun.

I wasn't one of the lucky ones to make it into the game (see those talented gits here on Inkle's website). But here's my story anyway. Enjoy! 

And thanks a bunch to Inkle for their snappy twitter support.
